channel.title: Reference on Avatar Optimizer (0.4.4-rc.1)
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on Avatar Optimizer (0.4.4-rc.1)

item.title: Clear Endpoint Position
item.description: Clear Endpoint Position # This component will replace EndpointPosition to 0 with adding _EndPhysBone GameObject. This component doesn’t have any configuration for now but there’s one button on the view. Clicking Apply and Remove component will applies this operation and removes this component. This may be useful for developing avatars.

item.title: Freeze BlendShape
item.description: Freeze BlendShape # Freeze & remove BlendShape from the mesh. Settings # You’ll see list of blend shapes and check to freeze blend shape.

item.title: Make Children
item.description: Make Children # These specified objects will be the children of this GameObject at build time.

item.title: Merge Bone
item.description: Merge Bone # If you add this component to some GameObject, this GameObject will be removed and bone is merged to parent bone. If the parent GameObject also have Merge Bone component, two bones are merged to parent of parent bone and so on. All children of GameObject this component is applied to will belongs to parent of this GameObject. This Component doesn’t have any configuration for now.

item.title: Merge PhysBone
item.description: Merge PhysBone # This component merges multiple PhysBone Components into one Component with MultiChildType == Ignore. In addition, Endpoint Position will be replaced to zero and _EndPhysBone GameObject will be added. This operation is same as Clear Endpoint Position. Settings # Components # The list of PhysBone Component. Drop to None element at the bottom to add PhysBone and reset to None to remove from the list. Overrides # Below the configurations, there’s configurations like VRCPhysBone.

item.title: Merge Skinned Mesh
item.description: Merge Skinned Mesh # Merges one or more SkinnedMeshRenderer and MeshRenderers into one SkinnedMeshRenderer. You should add MergeSkinnedMesh onto new GameObject with SkinnedMeshRenderer without specified Mesh. This component will merge mesh, bones, and BlendShapes but other settings will not be modified. Please edit SkinnedMeshRenderer component attached to same GameObject as MergeSkinnedMesh to set AnchorOverride or else. This component is good for merging your cloth meshes and body meshes but not good for face meshes because BlendShape can cause performance impact.

item.title: Merge ToonLit Material
item.description: Merge ToonLit Material # Merge VRChat/Mobile/Toon Lit materials to one material by packing texture manually. This component currently only supports VRChat/Mobile/Toon Lit because I believe there are big demands but I may add support for other shaders. (also for third-party shaders) If you want other shader support, please write a issue Settings # Click Add Merged Material to add merged material. For each merged material, you can set multiple source materials from materials.

item.title: Remove Mesh in Box
item.description: Remove Mesh in Box # Remove some polygons in any of specified boxes. Settings # Adjust the value to add box. For each box, you can change the center Position, Size, and Rotation of the box. (In local coordinate) Click Edit This Box to show Gizmo to edit the box like below. You can scale, move and rotate the box. Example # With boxes shown on upper image, meshes in the box will be removed as lower image shows.

item.title: UnusedBonesByReferencesTool
item.description: UnusedBonesByReferencesTool # Marks it as EditorOnly that bones referenced only from EditorOnly meshes. This is port of UnusedBonesByReferencesTool by Narazaka but run at build time.
